name: Mutation Overload
description:
HELLO, Metamorph-808 . You are a biologist who experimented with himself and became a mutant. The rest of the People are there, to kill you ! Kill them by Jumping on to them, Crushing them up! They shoot you with guns and this gives you a damage. Every time you kill them, you receive an AirDrop which increases your health.

YOUR TASK IS JUST TO KILL THEM AND ENJOY ! 

 HAPPY PLAYING MUTANT, :) 

_______CONTROLS________________

  • # Use AWD keys or Arrow Keys to move.
  • # Press 'F' to toggle Fullscreen.

_______CREDITS_________________
